trans-unit.source: Statistics timing is an attribute associated with a connection that you turn on and off by using the <codeph>SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_SET_STATISTICS_TIMING</codeph> system procedure.

seg-source.mrk: Statistics timing is an attribute associated with a connection that you turn on and off by using the <codeph>SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_SET_STATISTICS_TIMING</codeph> system procedure.

target.mrk: Statistics timing is an attribute associated with a connection that you turn on and off by using the <codeph>SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_SET_STATISTICS_TIMING</codeph> system procedure.

trans-unit.source: Statistics timing is turned off by default. Turn statistics timing on only when the <codeph>runtimestatistics</codeph> attribute is already on. Turning statistics timing on when the <codeph>runtimestatistics</codeph> attribute is off has no effect.

seg-source.mrk: Statistics timing is turned off by default.
Turn statistics timing on only when the <codeph>runtimestatistics</codeph> attribute is already on.
Turning statistics timing on when the <codeph>runtimestatistics</codeph> attribute is off has no effect.

target.mrk: Statistics timing is turned off by default.
Turn statistics timing on only when the <codeph>runtimestatistics</codeph> attribute is already on.
Turning statistics timing on when the <codeph>runtimestatistics</codeph> attribute is off has no effect.

trans-unit.source: Turn statistics timing on by calling this procedure with a non-zero argument. Turn statistics timing off by calling the procedure with a zero argument.

seg-source.mrk: Turn statistics timing on by calling this procedure with a non-zero argument.
Turn statistics timing off by calling the procedure with a zero argument.

target.mrk: Turn statistics timing on by calling this procedure with a non-zero argument.
Turn statistics timing off by calling the procedure with a zero argument.

trans-unit.source: When statistics timing is turned on, <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> tracks the timings of various aspects of the execution of a statement. This information is included in the information returned by the <codeph><xref href="rrefsyscsruntimestatsfunc.dita#rrefsyscsruntimestatsfunc">SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_GET_RUNTIMESTATISTICS</xref></codeph> system function. When statistics timing is turned off, the <codeph>SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_GET_RUNTIMESTATISTICS</codeph> system function shows all timing values as zero.

seg-source.mrk: When statistics timing is turned on, <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> tracks the timings of various aspects of the execution of a statement.

This information is included in the information returned by the <codeph><xref href="rrefsyscsruntimestatsfunc.dita#rrefsyscsruntimestatsfunc">SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_GET_RUNTIMESTATISTICS</xref></codeph> system function.
When statistics timing is turned off, the <codeph>SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_GET_RUNTIMESTATISTICS</codeph> system function shows all timing values as zero.

target.mrk: When statistics timing is turned on, <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> tracks the timings of various aspects of the execution of a statement.

This information is included in the information returned by the <codeph><xref href="rrefsyscsruntimestatsfunc.dita#rrefsyscsruntimestatsfunc">SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_GET_RUNTIMESTATISTICS</xref></codeph> system function.
When statistics timing is turned off, the <codeph>SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_GET_RUNTIMESTATISTICS</codeph> system function shows all timing values as zero.

trans-unit.source: By default, all users have execute privileges on this procedure.

seg-source.mrk: By default, all users have execute privileges on this procedure.

target.mrk: By default, all users have execute privileges on this procedure.
